name: REFLEC BEAT +
description:
REFLEC BEAT + is a new type of rhythm game where you tap moving objects in time with the beat to battle it out with your opponent for the highest score! Earn points by tapping the bar at the exact time the target objects pass over. The better the timing, the higher the points! When the song is over, the player with the highest score wins!

Keep a lookout for additional, familiar favorites that we'll be releasing through updates!

If you use the same account (Apple ID) on multiple devices, you can download previously purchased song packs to those devices with no additional charge.
